title:
B2B Login & Register
– B2B Demo Store - Debut Theme
content: Test out SparkLayer B2B You can test how SparkLayer works with our sample account. Email: shopify+b2b@sparklayer.io Password: test1234 Once signed in, you can begin browsing product pages, adding items to your order, completing the checkout with different payment methods, and then exploring your account area. If you're using the Shopify Dawn theme, try out our latest demo here . Welcome to our B2B area! Sign in below to get instant access to your B2B account and to start placing orders. Email Password Forgot your password? Reset your password We will send you an email to reset your password. Email Cancel Interested in opening an account? Are you a wholesale customer looking to stock our products? Apply for access below and we'll be in touch within 24 hours! Apply for B2B access

title:
Account
– B2B Demo Store - Debut Theme
content: We've sent you an email with a link to update your password. Login Please note Our B2B Demo Store is set up to allow both B2C and B2B ordering. Below you'll find the standard Shopify login for retail (B2C) customers. To access the B2B login page and test out SparkLayer, please click here . Email Password Forgot your password? Don't have an account yet? Create account Reset your password We will send you an email to reset your password. Email Cancel

content: Create Account First Name Last Name Email Password Applying for wholesale access If you'd like to apply for access to our wholesale ordering system, please complete the following fields Company Name Annual turnover Please select Under £200,000 Under £500,000 Over £1M Company Tax ID Company Web Address Contact Telephone
